column5: Just wondering who all from here will be attending the Berkley B1 on Lake st Francis this year. I will be participating again and hoping to cash a cheque, Lol. Feel free to say hi if ya see me there.
If i only had time i so would be there bud
No one wants to talk to u marvin!!
Hows long point treatin ya DINGIS.
I know when, but where ?

It will be out of Valleyfield bud. Sept 23-24. Tons of fun for the crowds as well as I beleive some free stuff to be tossed out as well the second day. I know I have some free stuff to be given away from my sponsors. It will be right in the harbour in the park. You wont be able to miss it. If you see my boat or me say hi. Its got Great Canadian Sportsman Magazine as well as Dobyns, Rod Glove, etc on it.
*spam* um, er, achoo?  I think...  Either way, I have allergies and one is to...
You on something Geoff?
yup but I forgot my spam pill today.
How is this spam? I compete every year and am proud to do so. I met 4 OFNers there last year and if I remember there were a few posts following it.
Marvin don't mind him he gets grumpy at night. It's passed his bed time

I just can't trust anything to do with 'B1' and everytime I see anything B1 I think it's just... not legit...  sorry.  not a shot at you at all, just the ORG of the events.  yes, yes it is...  BUT     zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
spam ???    Good Luck Marvin !!!! set some records
Saw alot of Bass boats prefishing the Franny today.Should be a good tourny.Some monsterous Smallies in there
Here is a video on the B1 from last year.  It's in french
I did not read the rules but I thought that prefishing was normally against a tournament rules?
Hahaha, let's just hope the franny treats u better then long point did me!! Good luck bro!
Pre fishing is not against tournament rules. I will have spent some time on the franny this year pre fishing for sure.
Most tournaments include a prefishing schedule. It's usually held for a couple of days immediately prior to the actual tournament. B1 is no exception.
Hey Marvin, I,m not doing it this year,but I,ll probably be there for sunday weigh in ,so you better make day 2. Send me a PM if you need another pep talk.............lol
